name: Acey Deucey Three of a Kind Video Poker FREE edition
name_original: Acey Deucey Three of a Kind Video Poker FREE edition
description:
Great Mini video poker with six games. Play any of the six games out of Jacks Or Better,Double-Double Bonus, Acey Deucey, Acey & Faces, Super Aces, All American.
If you love poker download this game now and horn your poker skills and learn about different poker combination. Our game is build on real casino poker algorithm and will make you feel like you are sitting in a vegas casino winning big bonuses and feeling the thrill for each deal.

How to play? The game holds the best card for you when you click Deal, you can hold any cards you want by clicking on card and then hit draw. The system will get you new cards other then you hold and pay rewards, its that easy :)


Royal Casino Video Poker includes features:
1. Six different poker games
2. Great Payouts within all games
3. Get Daily Free Coins
4. Raise or lower your bet by click of a button
5. In game Sounds, animation and Auto hold cards features
6. Shows Todays best and All time best score
7. Ads Disable feature with any in-app purchase
